statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_quantity = 20, min_threshold = 5 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET item_name = 'Updated Item', max_threshold = 50 WHERE item_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_quantity = current_quantity + 5, max_threshold = 100 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET min_threshold = 20, item_name = 'New Item' WHERE item_id = 2;
UPDATE food_items SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Low stock alert' WHERE item_id = '98765432-12ab-12cd-1234-123456abcdef';
UPDATE food_items SET quantity = 1000, expiring_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE id = 'b54a0354-1b4e-4da2-a826-2d9e4c6fdba2';
UPDATE alerts SET alert_type = 'Low Stock', alert_message = 'Only 5 items left', alert_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 'fc3891d7-5c29-4089-ada8-7b2cd66fb88c';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Low stock alert' WHERE item_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, expiry_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, alert_message = 'Low stock alert! Please restock soon.' WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE FoodItem SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Fridge SET temperature = 4.5, location = 'Kitchen' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE FoodItem SET quantity = 20, expiration_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Fridge SET temperature = 4.5, last_checked = NOW() WHERE location = 'Kitchen';
UPDATE FoodItems SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = 123;
UPDATE FridgeInventory SET last_refill_date = '2023-01-15', quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE fridge_id = 456 AND item_id = 789;
UPDATE FoodItems SET quantity = 10, expiration_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE FridgeInventory SET quantity = 20, last_refill_date = '2022-11-15' WHERE fridge_id = 1 AND item_id = 2;
